title: Why can we not edit rune pages during champion select?

replies.body:
Even if Riot did provide the feature to edit Rune Pages during Champion Select, there may not be enough time to do that, like we have to drag runes out and put other runes in.
Runes are not like masteries where we can just switch from one mastery to another without cancelling them beforehand.

I forgot that you buy rune pages with rp, i remember getting many with ip, maybe during an event. But don't you hate it when you're in ranked and it's the perfect time to whip out the eve, but then you realize you don't even have a rune page to allow you to clear your jungle. 

even just a single rune page that is able to be changed? just in case. and i sure as hell wouldn't change my runes every game in the lobby to avoid buying more. and with the increasing number of champions, it makes sense for there to be more rune pages, or changes to the rune system.

If you could edit rune pages in champ select, there is no reason to buy rune pages.
Companies need to make money, or this game wouldn't exist.

It's not rocket surgery.
Some people are using rp to buy rune pages and what do you use to buy rp? Money, riot doesn't want to lose out on money so they are doing this lol
If they allowed that, they would lose all their rune page RP sales, but it would be nice if we could do that :D
